Reviews.Title: Amazing Freaking Phone!, Worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: Monique123
Reviews.Content: So I purchased this phone over a week ago and it's been Fantastic!I love it, like its perfect for me. The battery qualtiy is average but the 5 megapixel rear facing camera is stunning with a LED flash capturing my "Kodak" moments. The Blackberry Curve 9360 Unlockedgot nothing on this unique phone. Also it's so trendy with the mauve and white contrast perrfectt! So prepaid carriers such as VirginMobile, BoostMobile, Are trying to make a status to, (aka Replenish and Venture). Don't buy it, Save your money and buy this phone for $ 139! This phone mixes a blackberry and a andriod phone into one!! Who wouldnt love this phone.!

Reviews.Title: Okay product..wasn't unlocked when it came.
Reviews.Author: Fire Daniels
Reviews.Content: This was an okay purchase; I had to call AT&T; to receive the unlock code which they gave me on the phone and was a non-issue. However, the phone will not connect to the FB app and the primary reason I purchased it doesn't work! Phone gets just so, so connection and if your getting it to modify with Straight Talk or other similar program, be forewarned that Straight Talks SIM program functions on the T-Mobile network and not Verizon's (like most of their other phones.

Reviews.Title: I would love it..
Reviews.Author: Sherri Nelson
Reviews.Content: I really like the phone itself...the size, weight, feel, keyboard and how easy it is to text. BUT, i am very disappointed for the fact that i can not send or receive picture messages! The phone said it is un-locked, but AT&T; rig something so unless you are using them for your service, you won't be sending any picture texts. That makes me bummed because i like to take pictures and send them to friends. If i would have known that fact, i would of chose a different phone. If you don't mind not being able to send or receive picture messages,...you will probably love this phone.

Reviews.Title: love it, but horrible internal memory space
Reviews.Author: gina lor
Reviews.Content: When i got the phone i was so excited. The company shipping did really good, but usps took forever and it arrived 2 weeks after the estimated date. I wasnt happy about that at all but it wasnt the companies fault because they sent it on time. I love the phone, but the memory space is horrible. I always have to clear memory or else the phone will be extra slow. Cant have a lot of apps either even if its on the sd card. The camera is decent. Screen is small but managable. Battery life is iffy too. For me it dies too quickly because i use it a lot.. but maybe its just me, but this is a good phone if you dont want any other apps that arent provided

Reviews.Title: HTC
Reviews.Author: Desiree Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my cousin in Austin TX , she just had a little girl and the phone she had was all broken and did not work anymore so I bought her a this HTC it was in great condition powered up well and she loved it thanks Amazon :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Aysha S
Reviews.Content: Product is as described in very good condition I love my new phone, and it came with the charger. Very fast shipping. Very courteous service. I am satisfied. Thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: little space..if i only read it carefully
Reviews.Author: ellie
Reviews.Content: i did not read the review. I look at the phone and said love it. I do love it. but it have a little space and the memory card do not help at all. so I will just keep it for a little while and buy me another one, with more memory space. other than that, the phone is good, love the keyboard and it works with youtube and it have wifi..remember if you buy this phone it have only 150mb. that is not enough..plus it comes with it owe apps with you cannot deleted..so that is why i give it a 4 star..

Reviews.Title: Love and hate situation
Reviews.Author: Johanna H.
Reviews.Content: I like the cellphone but, the software came with problems and i can barely use it, it has a lot of problems and i really dont know what to do with it... i was trying to returned it to the seller but i dont have to many options in my country (DR) and most of then are really expensive... the cellphone is great but this one has serious problem.I like the phone but the seller is so dishonest like i said in my other review this cellphone came without the micro sd and without earphones.

Reviews.Title: love the camera but
Reviews.Author: Ryan C. Smith "Ryan Smith"
Reviews.Content: HTC has a flaw, it only lets you use the first 128MB to install apps, and then it's full.  Even with SD card.  Would have loved to have kept it.

Reviews.Title: Wireless hotspot functionality was not unlocked!
Reviews.Author: Jaroslava Schovancova
Reviews.Content: The wireless hotspot functionality was not unlocked, it required registration with AT&T.; I had to return this thing. Have the same device but completely unlocked and love it, wanted to buy a new one as a backup/continuation. Was disappointed with this "unlocked" one.

Reviews.Title: GREAT phone
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Proffitt
Reviews.Content: I use this phone with Straight talk. I've had it for a while and Its a great phone wish the battery lasted longer.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: ashley
Reviews.Content: Just not enough memory. But I do like the phone. It's a little older which means the HTC sense software isn't up to par. But I just got it as a replacement phone and it works just fine for that.

Reviews.Title: a very good cell phone with very poor internal memory
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Yes that's the awful truth this very funtional cell has a poor 150 mb internal memory and it doesn't let you install many apps neither change it to the external memory, a real shame foy HTC

Reviews.Title: good price
Reviews.Author: allison
Reviews.Content: to be an older phone, it does have a few up to date features. the phone in general is a decent phone but not enough phone memory.

Reviews.Title: This is a remarkable phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I like this phone way better than the more expensive brands I was allowed to choose from with a 2-year commitment to my phone company.  It is unlocked and works perfectly with my GSM service.  I like the fact that it has android touchscreen capabilities but also a qwerty keyboard.  I didn't mind the small memory because I could use y microSD chip to augment that and hold a lot of my music, plus I use my tablet for major apps, so I don't need them on my phone. Great for texting, email, social media and other everyday uses.

Reviews.Title: nice phone but..... very little internal storage
Reviews.Author: rikki
Reviews.Content: i like this phone but when i downloaded apps i could only download very few because it has very little internal storage. but good camera and nice touchscreen, very easy to upload stuff to facebook because of the facebook key. overall good phone if u dont need many apps.

Reviews.Title: cool phone
Reviews.Author: Marlene
Reviews.Content: htc status is a really nice phone! But i can only give 3 stars because of the low intern space! Even after purchasing a 32gb memory card and converting all apps to it, the phone still had problems to be used properly and wanted to make you buy more intern space onlineEspecially for social platform fans this phone should still be a good choice!

Reviews.Title: fantastic phone
Reviews.Author: hrbud
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic phone... it has good battery life, fast and zippy (as zippy as dual core phones), great keyboard, very stable.  if the blackberry ran android, it would be similar to this phone.  the only major, major disadvantage is the memory.  it has barely enough memory to install 2-3 applications, that's all.  It's curious why HTC would put such a small memory into this phone.  if you need a phone primarily for messaging and LOTS of typing, this is it.  if you need a phone that can run loads of apps and be your personal butler, look elsewhere.  if HTC ever comes out with a newer version of this model with more memory, I would buy it again in a second.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: Love it, so pretty.Keyboard a little small for texting,but its such a cute phone which covers every thing.Love it!

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: renruth
Reviews.Content: loveeeeeee it, i'm so happy with my phone. i bought it in July, still not bored of it. the mauve color is so cute get so many compliments. Screen is pretty small but if mostly for texting its no problem. came on time. actually came the day after i ordered it.

Reviews.Title: I do love this phone
Reviews.Author: Teri G
Reviews.Content: I love the option of having a smart phone with a qwerty keyboard.  My only complaints are: 1) not enough internal storage, and 2) screen is small.  Otherwise, it is a very nice, user-friendly phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Jay Williams "Jay"
Reviews.Content: First one shipped had a defect where the lower left corner of the screen would not respond to touch(menu button, home button and lower left on scome screens).  Did factory reset etc. didn't help.  Tried it probably 50 times myself over two days and almost never responded.  Seller orderinstant was nice enough to send out a new one, even letting us hang on to the old one before the new one got there since it's hard to do without a phone.  Interestingly, while we waited for the old one to arrive, this defect seemed to get better, until eventually it seemed to work 99% of the time.  Maybe the screen resistors needed to stretch a little or something, but anyway, this is a great phone.  Originally $300 msrp I think, great screen, GREAT camera, facebook button, etc.  Getting good battery life too.  Wifi works great, love ATT coverage and voice quality, even though we use this a pay as you go phone.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful tricky purchase
Reviews.Author: Gil J
Reviews.Content: Beautiful phone but guess what Internet from T Mobile doesn't work even says in the details they should tell you.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: yazan
Reviews.Content: It is like a blackberry , But the reason why I like It more because it has a touch screen and more application ability

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: Best value-price relation in the smartphone market, as far as I know. No problems with the delivery. My girlfriend is very happy with it. Three little drawbacks: facebook key isn't working, there is little internal memory, so an SD card is a MUST and I haven't found an app which will put to use the front camera (not Skype, not Google+, etc).

Reviews.Title: NICE ANDROID PHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: Linda Vera
Reviews.Content: NICE ANDROID PHONE, EASE TO USE, THE ONLY THING ABOUT THIS PHONE THAT I RECOMMEND TO IMPROVE IS THE LIFE OF THE BATTERY, ANYWAY IT'S WORTH IT.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
3G-enabled, Android-powered smartphone with dedicated Facebook share button, 2.6-inch touchscreen, and full QWERTY keyboard
800 MHz processor; Wireless-N Wi-Fi networking (with optional Wi-Fi Mobile Hotspot service); GPS for navigation and location services
5-MP camera/camcorder; VGA front camera; Bluetooth 3.0; HTML web browser with Flash support; corporate and personal e-mail
Up to 6.5 hours of talk time, up to 640 hours (26.6 days) of standby time; released in July, 2011
ProductInfo.Name: HTC Status ChaCha A810a Unlocked Phone with QWERTY Keyboard, 5MP Camera, Wi-Fi and GPS - US Warranty - Mauve/White
